item.description:
It's Restaurant Week in Newport and March 31st is the last day  we can get a 3-course lunch for $15!  (If you want to go for dinner on your own, it's $30 for a 3-course meal.)  We thought this would be a great way to kick off Spring!  We changed the time/date so that you would get the opportunity to experience this Newport Tradition.

Please note the change in date and time to: Saturday, March 31st at 11am.  (The original date was April 1st at 11:30am.  This has been cancelled.)

Atlantic Beach Club can accommodate up to 15 people so I need definite rsvp's on this one.  If you find you can't make it, please change your rsvp to "no" so those on the waiting list can attend. 

We've never done this before but have been told it is a very good event.  To bringing in the Spring...

Tonia & Dave
item.name: Newport Restaurant Week
